Rulings.Edison:
● The only way you can Special Summon this card is via its own procedure.
Even if it was initially summoned that way, you still can't summon it with card effects.
Rulings.Tengu:
● The only way you can Special Summon this card is via its own procedure.
Even if it was initially summoned that way, you still can't summon it with card effects.

PSCT.Edison:
© Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. 
© Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by tributing 1 "Levia-Dragon - Daedalus".
① You can send 1 face-up "Umi" you control to the GY; send all cards in each player's hand and field to the GY, except this card.
PSCT.Tengu:
© Can't be Normal Summoned/Set. 
© Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by tributing 1 "Levia-Dragon - Daedalus".
① You can send 1 face-up "Umi" you control to the GY; 
send all cards in each player's hand and field to the GY, except this card.

PSCT.Base: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 1 "Levia-Dragon - Daedalus". You can send "Umi" you control to the Graveyard to send all cards in both players' hands and on the field to the Graveyard, except this card.
